morning.quote: Let's do great work today!
It is a new day!
Start your day with a smile!
Seize the day!
Make the most of your morning
A productive morning leads to success
Make today amazing!
Rise and shine!
New opportunities await each morning
Your journey begins in the morning
Embrace the morning sun!
morning.author: A. R. Rahman

morning.quote: Morning is full of possibilities.
morning.author: Charles M. Schulz

morning.quote: Every day is a fresh start.
morning.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

morning.quote: Morning is the best time to begin.
morning.author: George Allen

morning.quote: Awake, arise, and achieve!
morning.author: John Milton

morning.quote: Success begins with the morning.
morning.author: George Allen

morning.quote: Morning brings new hope.
morning.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

morning.quote: The sun is new each day
morning.author: Heraclitus

morning.quote: The morning steals upon the night, melting the darkness
morning.author: William Shakespeare

morning.quote: The morning was full of sunlight and hope
morning.author: Kate Chopin

morning.quote: The morning is the most important part of the day
morning.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

morning.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive, to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
morning.author: Marcus Aurelius

morning.quote: The sun is a daily reminder that we too can rise again from the darkness, that we too can shine our own light.
morning.author: S. Ajna

morning.quote: When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye.
morning.author: Cathy Guisewite

morning.quote: Another day, another chance
morning.author: A.D. Aliwat

morning.quote: Every day we can learn something new
morning.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

morning.quote: Every day grants us opportunities to do good. Take advantage of them. Do good. Be happy.
morning.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

morning.quote: The successes and failures of yesterday are gone, today is a new day.
morning.author: Noel DeJesus

morning.quote: Each new day has a different shape to it. You just roll with it
morning.author: Ben Zobrist

morning.quote: Every day brings you a chance to draw in a breath, kick off your shoes, and dance.
morning.author: Oprah Winfrey

morning.quote: Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
morning.author: Buddha

morning.quote: If you have responsibility in the afternoon, you must have energy in the morning

afternoon.quote: Let's finish the day with a bang!
May the rest of your day be filled with joy, peace, and success.
The biggest motivation is your own thoughts, so think big and motivate yourself to win.
The afternoon is yours to conquer
You're doing great! Keep it up!
Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are.
afternoon.author: Julius Charles Hare

afternoon.quote: The stillness of an afternoon is a reminder to slow down, breathe and simply be
afternoon.author: Lao Tzu

afternoon.quote: Spend the afternoon. You canâ€™t take it with you.
afternoon.author: Annie Dillard

evening.quote: Sleep well and wake up refreshed
The night is a canvas of dreams
